name: The Bear & The Admiral - Demo
description:
A cartoony run and gun / platformer about a bear and an admiral in space! The galaxy has been overrun and its residents frozen in stasis. It's up to the titular bear and admiral to fight their way through the enemy aliens and save the day. 

This game has been my 2020 project and is edging closer to completion. The demo contains the game's first world, with five more worlds appearing in the full game, plus a few surprises.

Hand drawn cartoon style visuals and gameplay influenced by 90s platformers, particularly those on the SNES and Sega Megadrive / Genesis, with pickups and power-ups.

Can be controlled with keyboard or gamepad (tutorial in game).

CREDITS

All programming, art and concepts  are by Irish developer Jack Boylan.

Music and sound effects: Some tracks are by Rhys Connolly, who is currently composing more for the game's soundtrack. The rest of the music and sound effects are from Storyblocks.com (apart from one sound effect "Small Scrape" from Soundbible.com, recorded by Caroline Ford and used under Attribution 3.0 License). Some sounds have been edited.

PLEASE NOTE CURRENT FILE IS WINDOWS ONLY
